alert.note: Alert for Butler (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 29 at 4:29AM EDT until July 29 at 5:00AM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 500 AM EDT FOR SOUTHERN BUTLER COUNTY... At 429 AM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 7 miles south of Oxford, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and power lines. Locations impacted include... Hamilton, Oxford, Monroe, Trenton, Seven Mile, Williamsdale, Darrtown, Reily, New Miami, Millville, College Corner, Okeana, Mcgonigle, St. Charles, Alert and Layhigh. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. To report severe weather, go to our website at weather.gov/iln and submit your report via social media, when you can do so safely.
